channel.title: Couple of nooby questions
channel.description:
Hey guys im brand new to this and I have a couple questions.
-How can I change the background behind login screen? -Is portforwarding with uTorrent ever going to run into problems. -I had one more but now I cant think of it lol. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Couple of nooby questions
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“singed, post:2, topic:373951”]utorrent has it’s limits but so does any vps… but if ur happy to hold a max of 100 players to keep the server stable then it should be fine
secondly, post ur client background question in the client help section and i will help u there.[/quote]

lol

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of nooby questions
item.dc:creator: @singed singed
item.description:
@singed wrote:

utorrent has it’s limits but so does any vps… but if ur happy to hold a max of 100 players to keep the server stable then it should be fine
secondly, post ur client background question in the client help section and i will help u there.

Read full topic
